statement.sql: INSERT INTO OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE (CORRELATION_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, INTERFACE_NAME, STATUS, TIMEIN, TIMEOUT) VALUES (?,?,'ReleaseFundsResponse','OK',NOW(),NOW())
INSERT INTO OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE (CORRELATION_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, INTERFACE_NAME, STATUS, TIMEIN) VALUES (?,?,'ReleaseFundsResponse','Pending',NOW())
INSERT INTO OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE (CORRELATION_ID, TRANSACTION_ID, INTERFACE_NAME, STATUS, TIMEIN) VALUES (?,?,'ReleaseFundsResponse','Pending',NOW())
select Status, TIMEIN from OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE WHERE CORRELATION_ID = ? AND INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse' ORDER BY TIMEIN DESC LIMIT 1
Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET STATUS = 'KO' , CAUSE = 'ALREADY_CHARGED' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'
select * from HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE WHERE CORRELATION_ID = ? AND INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReserveFunds' ORDER BY TIMEIN DESC LIMIT 1

Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET STATUS = 'KO' , CAUSE = 'SUBSCRIBER_NOT_FOUND' ,`DESCRIPTION`='Subscriber cannot be found using IMSI provided.' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'

Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET AMOUNT = ?, MSISDN = ?,DESCRIPTION = ?, STATUS = 'OK' , CAUSE = 'SUCCESS' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'

Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET AMOUNT = ?, MSISDN = ?,DESCRIPTION = ?, STATUS = 'OK' , CAUSE = 'SUCCESS' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'
Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET TRANSACTION_ID = ? , STATUS = 'KO' , CAUSE = 'SUBSCRIBER_NOT_FOUND' ,`DESCRIPTION`="SUBSCRIBER_NOT_FOUND." WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and INTERFACE_NAME= ''

reason.value: This is an operation implementation generated fault

statement.sql: Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET STATUS = 'KO' , CAUSE = 'SYSTEM_DOWN' ,`DESCRIPTION`='SYSTEM DOWN' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'

Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET STATUS = 'SYSTEM_BUSY' , CAUSE = 'SYSTEM_BUSY' ,`DESCRIPTION`='GENERAL_DECLINE' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'
Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET STATUS = 'KO' , CAUSE = 'NOT_RESERVED' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'
Update OTTHub_Wso2.HUB_TRANSACTION_STORE SET STATUS = 'KO' , CAUSE = 'CHARGE_TOO_OLD' WHERE CORRELATION_ID= ? and TRANSACTION_ID = ? and INTERFACE_NAME= 'ReleaseFundsResponse'
